2025-09-18.content: Upgraded the Open Telemetry image from v0.118.0 to v0.119.0 to pick up vulnerability fixes. To understand the changes in each release, review the full changelog for [opentelemetry-collector-contrib](https://github.com/open-telemetry/opentelemetry-collector-contrib/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md).

summary.title: Open Telemetry Image Upgrade
summary.summary: The Open Telemetry image has been upgraded to v0.119.0 to address security vulnerabilities. For detailed changes, please refer to the complete changelog.

2025-09-02.content: Config Sync is now available as part of the standard GKE offering and no longer requires GKE Enterprise. For more details on the removal of GKE Enterprise, see the [GKE release notes](https://cloud.google.com/kubernetes-engine/docs/release-notes#September_02_2025).

summary.title: Config Sync Now Available in GKE Standard
summary.summary: Config Sync is now included in the standard GKE offering, eliminating the need for GKE Enterprise.

2025-08-21.content:
Announcing experimental features: help shape the future of Config Sync features by providing direct feedback.

* Introducing PostSync, a feature that lets you run custom actions like cleanup scripts or notifications right after your configurations are synced. We're looking for your feedback to shape its future! Check out the [Post Sync discussion](https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/kpt-config-sync/discussions/1830) to share your thoughts, suggestions, and bug reports before December 1, 2025.

summary.title: Experimental Features Announcement
summary.summary: PostSync: Run custom actions after config sync.

2025-08-21.content: Config Sync now supports syncing from Secure Source Manager git repositories. For more information, see [Grant access to Git](https://cloud.google.com/kubernetes-engine/enterprise/config-sync/docs/how-to/installing-config-sync#git-creds-secret).

summary.title: Config Sync supports Secure Source Manager
summary.summary: Config Sync now supports syncing from Secure Source Manager git repositories.

2025-07-24.content: Addressed multiple Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures (CVEs) by updating dependencies.

Updated the git-sync image from v4.3.0 to v4.4.2, which fixes an issue that could cause the git-sync container to crash loop. For more information see [git-sync releases](https://github.com/kubernetes/git-sync/releases).

summary.title: Fixed git-sync image
summary.summary: git-sync image updated to v4.4.2 to fix crash loop.

2025-07-24.content: Fixed a regression introduced in 1.21.0 that occasionally caused Config Sync to become stuck when applying [mutation ignored objects](https://cloud.google.com/kubernetes-engine/enterprise/config-sync/docs/concepts/configs#ignoring).

summary.title: Config Sync Fix
summary.summary: Fixed a regression that caused Config Sync to get stuck when applying mutation ignored objects.

2025-07-24.content: Fixed an issue where Config Sync waited longer than intended between retry attempts after failing to sync from Helm and OCI sources.

2025-06-26.content: Fixed an issue with the nomos CLI which prevented setting up autocomplete by using the `nomos completion` command. For more information see [Use the nomos command-line tool](https://cloud.google.com/kubernetes-engine/enterprise/config-sync/docs/how-to/nomos-command).

summary.title: Fixed nomos CLI autocomplete setup
summary.summary: This release fixes an issue where the nomos CLI autocomplete setup was failing. Users can now successfully set up autocomplete using the `nomos completion` command.

2025-06-26.content: Fixed an issue which prevented a resource conflict metric from being recorded in rare cases.

summary.title: Resource conflict metric recording issue fixed
summary.summary: The resource conflict metric will now be recorded correctly in all cases, resolving a rare issue.
